programme.title: E-Motions 2.0

programme.title: Life Stories with Marc Hoberman

programme.title: Life Stories with Marc Hoberman
programme.desc: Actor Simon Twu talks about his experiences in acting, commercials, and his new movie. Simon also speaks about his Simon Technique Studio used for teaching people how to sing effectively.

programme.title: Life Stories with Marc Hoberman
programme.desc: Armand Mastroianni talks about his experiences as a young student of film and his journey as a Hollywood director. His body of work speaks volumes to his standing in the entertainment industry.

programme.title: Gift
programme.desc: GIFT is a tribute to something that can’t be measured or counted, bought or sold. An exploration of real-life gift economies, it’s a reflection on the creative process, the reasons we labor in service of our gifts, and a celebration of the imagination.

programme.desc: Want to know the secrets of great kissers? And we’ll show you what exercise seniors can do to improve their sex lives. Plus dealing with the emotions during a divorce.

programme.title: Sex Talk

programme.desc: The science of falling in love, plus putting the spark back into your sex life. Also, there are some health benefits to “going commando” but there are some things you always must keep in mind.

programme.title: The Rising Man Podcast
programme.sub-title: Sexual Insecurities: Expression Leads To Liberation with Taylor Johnson & Jeddy Azuma
programme.desc: Men’s sex coach Taylor Johnson knows the top blockages to masculine sexual liberation and offers examples of how to HEAL. We also explore how to achieve sexual mastery and why lasting a long time doesn’t usually lead to good sex.

programme.title: The Rising Man Podcast
programme.sub-title: How Passive Permission Asking Sabotages Epic Sex with Sarrah Rose & Jeddy Azuma
programme.desc: Sarrah Rose is a men’s coach specialized in tantric activation, sexual healing, and relational mastery. She leads men to re-discover their primal and sacred generative powers, and shares some of her juiciest findings with us.

programme.title: Hope Is Here
programme.desc: The way to healing can take on different forms. Little 7-year-old Leonor, was suffering from a very rare cancer, and it was decided she needed an uplifting project to give her hope. What better medicine than an endearing song that was created from Lenore and her sister Dot's imagination and a ridiculously cute and famous dog named Doug the Pug? This episode of Hope is Here is about how a famous dog, creativity, and a group of caring individuals came together to give a little girl a world of hope to carry on. The path to healing can manifest in various ways. Meet Leonor, a resilient 7-year-old girl battling a highly uncommon form of cancer. Recognizing her need for inspiration and optimism, a heartwarming project was conceived. What could be more uplifting than a captivating melody born from the vivid imaginations of Leonor and her sister Dot, accompanied by the adorable and renowned Doug the Pug? In this episode of Hope is Here we witness the extraordinary convergence of a beloved canine, boundless creativity, and a compassionate community, all united to bestow upon a young girl a profound sense of hope for the future.

programme.title: Hope Is Here
programme.desc: Parents raise their children to ultimately achieve their independence. Yet removing barriers to attain the goal of independence is filled with great challenges for parents of children with special needs. Hope is Here focuses on a family, a very special foundation, and a Florida hospital system that is going to great lengths to empower individuals with intellectual disabilities with strength, confidence, and a sense of self-worth.

programme.title: Hope Is Here
programme.desc: Imagine being a child fighting cancer. Treatments, medications, and uncertainty fill your day. A boy named Oliver decided to face his disease and pain with fierce determination. Once strong again, he was filled with gratitude because of the love and support he received during his treatment. Yet it was a symbolic jacket that he wore during the days of his cancer treatments that inspired him to start his organization designed to cheer up other children dealing with cancer around the United States. Hope is Here covers the selfless story of Oliver's Patch Project.

programme.title: Hope Is Here
programme.desc: Ventilator-dependent children are limited in their ability to participate in sports and recreation. Enjoying childhood to its fullest is often not possible. Every year VACC Camp affords children on ventilators the chance to enjoy a stress-free day at the beach as they are supported by camp volunteers and the Miami Beach Fire and Rescue. This episode of Hope is Here interviews a participating doctor at Nicklaus Children's Hospital as well as a family that enjoys this unique opportunity to see their child enjoy the beach for the first time.

programme.title: Hope Is Here
programme.desc: Finding inspiration to fight cancer calls upon the courage and an immense determination to soldier through the most challenging days. This arduous journey also requires support and love from friends and family. Michael Cramer was gifted with all these necessary ingredients to forge ahead, not only from a family who loves him but especially from a mother whose encouragement strengthened her son through his darkest moments. Here is Michael's remarkable story about a mother's love, his undying resilience, and the crucial lessons he learned about giving back the gift of survival.

programme.title: OmStars- Yoga Is Series
programme.desc: Today’s lesson is about sanctuary and how to find a place of calm and peace deep within yourself.

programme.title: OmStars- Yoga Is Series
programme.sub-title: Yoga Is - Day 25 Forgiveness Utthita Hasta Padangustasana
programme.desc: Welcome to day 25 where our asana focus is on a single leg lift known as Utthita Hasta Padangustasana.

programme.title: Good Morning Joy
programme.desc: Founder, Glenn Marsden, of Imperfectly Perfect Campaign, and Jeremy Jackson, former Baywatch star share their personal journeys with body dysmorphia and how it led to a worldwide campaign. A young man faces his fears and a tale of kindness at 30,000 ft.

programme.title: Good Morning Joy
programme.sub-title: Good Morning Joy - Steps to Brave Healing
programme.desc: Laura Di Franco, CEO of Brave Healer Productions, discusses brave healing and the power of sharing our stories. And, meet Oyen the ginger cat and adorable kids from India, along with Daaji redefining meditation for a joyful heart.

programme.title: The Aware Show
programme.sub-title: The Aware Show: William Peters - Shared Death Experiences
programme.desc: Host Lisa Garr interviews William Peters, who is recognized as a global leader in the field of near death and shared death studies and has spent decades studying end-of-life experiences. He is the founder of the Shared Crossing Project and director of its Research Initiative. His latest book is At Heaven's Door: What Shared Journeys to the Afterlife Teach About Dying Well and Living Better.

programme.title: The Aware Show
programme.sub-title: The Aware Show: John Assaraf - The Power to Change
programme.desc: Host Lisa Garr interviews John Assaraf, one of the leading high performance, success coaches in the world. He is a behavioral neuroscience researcher who has written four books including two NYT bestsellers and has been featured in 11 movies. He is CEO of MyNeuroGym.com, a neuroscience-based company, dedicated to helping individuals strengthen their mindset and skills, so they achieve their goals and dreams. Info: theawareshow.com/brainathon.

programme.title: The Aware Show
programme.sub-title: The Aware Show: Lon - Uncover Your Magical Powers
programme.desc: Host Lisa Garr interviews Lon, an author and artist who specializes in Sacred Geometry. Patterns make up all of nature and how we look and understand these magical constructs can make vast differences in our perceived reality. Lon explains how we all have the power within us to work magic and by understanding these sacred shapes and patterns, we can further experience our unlimited potential. She discusses her new book Modern Merlin.

programme.title: The Aware Show
programme.sub-title: The Aware Show: Mandy Morris - Power of Manifestation
programme.desc: Host Lisa Garr interviews Mandy Morris, an author and entrepreneur who studies the science of manifestation. She explains how to manifest your dreams and live a life of endless possibilities. By removing the emotional, mental, and energetic blocks which hold us back, Mandy explains how we can reach a higher frequency. Her book is 8 Secrets to Powerful Manifesting: How to Create the Reality of Your Dreams.

programme.title: Pull Up The Curtain with G Souldier
programme.sub-title: Pull Up The Curtain - Cherie Johnson
programme.desc: An In-Depth interview with Cherie Johnson. Talks Punky Brewster, Family Matters, and Career

programme.title: The Big Flipping Break
programme.desc: Glenn and Amber have flipped over 1,000 houses and now they're looking for one lucky contestant to flip a house with. They are passionate about helping everyday people create wealth through real estate investing. So when casting call went out and submissions poured in. Watch as they look for the right partner to not only train but also to completely fund their first deal.

programme.title: The Big Flipping Break
programme.desc: David and Alicia have won the contest, but the real game is about to begin. They have to find a house to flip, win Glenn and Amber's trust, and prove they can handle the pressures of house flipping. Because what David and Alicia don't know is that there's an even bigger test going on...Glenn and Amber are looking for more than a single flip, they want long-term investing partners they can fund. If these two newbies can get to pull it off...they are about to get their Big Flipping Break!

programme.title: The Big Flipping Break
programme.desc: The team is feeling the pressure as a competitive real estate market threatens to kill the deal before they even get started. Glenn and Amber are starting to worry David and Alicia are in way over their heads.
